manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SABRENT Flexible Tripod with Ball Head Bundle for Standard Tripod Mount (GP-TRPD-TBHD) What’s in the box? Flexible Tripod GoPro mount adapter Mini Ball Head with Lock and Hot Shoe Adapter User Manual

SABRENT Flexible Tripod with Ball Head Bundle for Standard Tripod Mount (GP-TRPD-TBHD) Every cameraman needs a tripod, especially one as versatile as Sabrent’s Flexible Tripod. The Flexible Tripod features a removable GoPro Tripod Mount for fast and secure camera mounting. Rubberized ring and foot grips provide extra gripping power and stability. And it flexible design enables you to level out GoPro camera on uneven surfaces. Get the shot you want with Sabrent’s Flexible Tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, sturdy, stable, and with a metal attachment screw. Perfect for the price.
reviews.reviewText: In my opinion, the biggest thing here is the screw that attaches to your camera is made of metal. Before this tripod, I bought two others which both had a plastic screw that was made of a shiny chromed plastic that looks like metal in pictures. Needless to say I was more than a bit annoyed at those purchases. Those plastic screws were flimsy and prone to breaking(one did break but I returned the other before it got a chance) This metal screw on a sturdy base however, doesn't appear to be going anywhere.The base itself feels solid and the connecting joints, all tight. I'm not planning on using anything heavier than a GoPro but I could easily see this tripod supporting the weight of a much larger DSLR camera. On that note, as many other reviews have pointed out, there is a metal cap on the default screw that converts this into a DSLR compatible tripod. Though personally, were I to use a DSLR camera, I'd probably buy something a bit bigger.Back to the GoPro, if you're looking for a little extra height, I find that screwing my GoPole into this tripod does the trick and holds the camera up higher. It will be a little less stable so you'll need to spread the legs out a bit but the female lanyard attachment point is a perfect fit for the male screw that would normally hold the camera.I did purchase the extra swivel mount but after messing around with it a bit, it feels quite unnecessary. These legs bend and fold enough to give you most angles.Overall, I rate this tripod a good buy. My only complaint is that the color scheme I got is black and grey. I would have preferred black and white like what is shown in the pictures but I'm not going to make a fuss over something like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Love it!No comments honestly. I thought it might be too short, but it's a nice size. Works well with my phone, great for the price. All around very happy. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't get it wet like I did
reviews.reviewText: Don't get it wet like I did; otherwise, it will fall apart. I decided to try this on one of my dives thinking it would be okay, even after rinsing it off with fresh water. After my dive, the flexible ball head wouldn't hold in position any longer. my camera kept falling to the side while recording. It was good before I did that. You could say it was my fault and it would be true, but you would also think it would be built to withstand getting water in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product; sturdy construction
reviews.reviewText: The tripod was exactly what I was looking for at a good price. It's well made, very sturdy and works great with my camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beware !!! Ballhead socket doesn't fit on Tripod Mount.
reviews.reviewText: For what it is and the price you pay, it's a great tripod. It does its job well. The only complaint I have, and why I gave it 3 stars, is that I bought it with the ballhead and gopro mount that don't even fit on the tripod. The screw in sockets are two different sizes making it impossible to screw on. Highly disappointing. I would not recommend buying the extra accessories. It was a waste of $3.00.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice durable tripod
reviews.reviewText: When I first gotten my tripod I was confused, it seemed that the gopro tripod attachment would not fit the tripod mounting screw. After some time trying to figure it out , I finally realized that the tripod mounting screw had a protective cover on it that looked like the mounting screw itself, so I unscrewed it and behold there was the actual mounting screw that fits the gopro tripod attachment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars PARTS DO NOT FIT. Completely unusable.
reviews.reviewText: The top thread of the legs does not fit the ball head. So no elevation can be achieved for the standard thread. Absolutely useless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: It is hard to beat this for the money. I ended up going with this cheap knock-off because I wanted something with a small ball-head. It works great for that. It will support at Oly TG-5, even at a bit of an angle. I haven't tried wrapping the tripod legs around something to see how strong that is, but for pointing the camera at different angles and locking the head down, it held. I like these style of legs for certain things, but w/o a head they're not near as useful, which is why I ended up going with this one.
Bought as a gift so haven’t seen it in use but it was delivered quickly it looks great I hope it works as well as it looks

reviews.reviewTitle: Be careful to get one with the right attachment!
reviews.reviewText: I cant use mine, and yes should have returned, but it took me ages to start to use it. The attachment only fits GoPro, they way it was written, I thought the GoPro adapter was an extra, and that it still fitted standard camera's. Clearly I made a mistake!
Its an excellent product. Came early as I expected.
The base thread is too large for the attachments. It is UNUSEABLE. By the time I discovered this my window for return (which was very short) had closed.
